.. _huang:

Huang *et al.*
==============

.. code-block:: bibtex

    @article{huang2015importance,
        title={Importance of coordination number and bond length in titanium revealed by electronic structure investigations},
        author={Huang, Liang-Feng and Grabowski, Blazej and McEniry,  and Trinkle, Dallas R and Neugebauer, J{\"o}rg},
        journal={Phys. Status Solidi B},
        volume={252},
        number={9},
        pages={1907--1924},
        year={2015},
        publisher={Wiley Online Library}
    }
